title: Mini review from a Editors POV
text:
CapCut isn‚Äôt bad as people say it is, if you learn how to use it and figure out tricks to make your editing style more efficient this app is precisely what you need for editing. Although I would say there needs to be more Versatility for shakes and text shakes, I would ask so recommended there is a section where we can import our own files of text fonts and shakes. Also I noticed the more I import and add effects the more the laggy the preview gets. And I understand that is normal. Although I think it‚Äôs a bit abnormal for how laggy it is. I can‚Äôt even get 1 second of it playing semi normally, because it freezes. 
To conclude, I give this app a 5/5 for beginners or people who just want to edit for fun. 
And a 3/5 in terms of wanting 10/10 edits
~ Sibrent (on yt)

title: Awesome
text:
Alright so here are my pros and cons

Pros:
‚Ä¢ Completely Free - Their is no premium no subscription no nothing. The only thing that costs money in this app is getting more MBs in the cloud.

‚Ä¢ Easy To Use - This app is the most easy editing app I have ever seen and it still has a lot of features. I was able to teach my self by just messing around.

‚Ä¢ Templates - Templates are really good if you are a beginner and just want to Make really cool videos.

‚Ä¢ Tutorials - Their are tutorials built in to this app for you to learn if you need it.

‚Ä¢ Editing Photos - If you don‚Äôt have a photo editing app this would be a great substitute for it.

Cons:

‚Ä¢ Not on Windows,Or Mac - This isn‚Äôt really a big issue but I would love to see this in the future

‚Ä¢ Phone Dying Glitch - Their is this glitch where if your device dies while editing a video the video you were working will now be extremely laggy (Just the visuals) And it will be like this even when you export it. I don‚Äôt let my phone die while editing because of this so it may have been fixed but just in case it hasnt. I‚Äôm going to leave this here.

So yeah this app has been awesome for me and has helped me and a bunch of other people. Thanks for being awesome.

title: Great app, however-
text:
When I first got this app, it was great, especially for beginner editors and such. However, as time has gone by and new updates have been released, I have not been as satisfied with my experience as I once was. 
Now, when I finish an edit and export it, it becomes off-beat. I use the match cut feature to ensure that my clips align with the audio, and check it before I export, but somewhere in the export process the clips unaligned with the audio. Additionally, When I make an edit where I use a scene, I have to split the scene in order to format it. I make sure that I cut it in the right place, so that there isn't a split second of the camera switch before the next clip. When I do this in the app, I am successful, but once I export the entire video, I get that unfortunate split second of the camera switch. 
I would like to see a future update fixing these issues!

I love CapCut so much, if you‚Äôre a beginner editor, it is not confusing at all. Sure, it may be a tad bit struggle at first, but it is extremely easy to use once you see just a 2 minute tutorial, and then you can make really good edits. I wish I could show you one of my edits, but anyways, extremely simple, has all the effects you need, graphics, and transitions. Absolute 10/10. Probably the best editing app. Also, if you‚Äôre ever have any glitches, or it acts slow, then you may need to update CapCut. If it doesn‚Äôt let you, then it‚Äôs probably your phone/IPad itself ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è because CapCut is constantly updated and gets rid of their bugs, but anyways, thank you for reading this if you made it through. I hope you have a wonderful day/night luv<3

title: great

title: Fonts and Animation
text:
Greetings, Capcut creator. I am very pleased to say that this app is amazing! Absolutely worth my time. Making edits on this app is so fun and it never takes me too long. The no watermark really helps because I don‚Äôt want to waste money on an editing app just to remove something.  But I have suggestions to make this app even better even though you might not see this.
A- Fonts
  Now we have a lot of great fonts in this app, although I feel like we could use more Sans Serif or just Serif fonts to make it more regular but to really step it up. Frankly, you can use the different language fonts in English sentences, I feel like to make our editing jobs more modern we could use more round, and bubbly fonts. 

Example: Champagne & Limousines, Blacklisted, and etc.

B- Animation
    Don‚Äôt get me wrong, the animations on this app are everything. Even better than most transitional animations. However, I feel as though we need graphs to make our own video animations. Font animations are okay, but I feel like it‚Äôd be cooler to add the same animations for the fonts as the pictures have.

-Sincerely,
          Anonymous
P.S. - I know this update would take a while, but you‚Äôd benefit off of it. Trust me xx

title: The best editing app overall!
text: I‚Äôve been using Capcut for a few months now and I‚Äôd say its my go to editing app! The fact that it‚Äôs absolutely free and super easy to use makes it a lot less complicated for beginner editors. I‚Äôd just like to suggest a few things that I have issues with. One thing for sure is to add graphs so the key frames look a lot smoother and better. Secondly, adding some more fonts and animations for the texts. I think there should be in and out animations for the loops texts so I don‚Äôt have to save it separately to add it in. And maybe let users make custom animations too? Its just my opinion, but I think the app will be a lot more compatible if that was added in. Overall the app is great and I hope that the developers see my opinions for upcoming updates :]

title: Can‚Äôt Go Without.
text:
I can be really salty with video editing apps, but this one is perfection. I don‚Äôt have too many bad things to say about it. As a fellow template creator,_Box_Face_, I use this app everyday! My only problem is the Pro feature. So many things we are unable to use if we don‚Äôt pay a monthly or yearly fee. I do see CapCut becoming better with this, but yeah the only thing I ask is to add some new (and better) things. I would also enjoy a feature to where you can make a watermark for your videos, save it, and have like a little folder to just import it which would be SUPER helpful! 

  Again, love the app. The creatures did an outstanding job and this app is very underrated. Hope to see more of positive growth!

            _Box_Face_

title: It‚Äôs a lovely app, but I have some recommendations
text: I love this app! It‚Äôs a great beginner app if you‚Äôre just getting into editing and it‚Äôs also great if you‚Äôre more advanced! I‚Äôve been editing for 9 months and I can constantly find new things to try and different editing techniques all on a completely FREE (yes, there are NO in app purchases!) app! I do have a few suggestions tho! 1) better audio capabilities. This app doesn‚Äôt have many things to do with audio, maybe add some better voice changers? The sound also doesn‚Äôt get very loud so that‚Äôs a bummer:/ 2) split screen templates! There are ways to do split screens but you have to completely do it from scratch so it‚Äôs a bit of a hassle. It also is very hard to do if you‚Äôre a beginner so this is something I would very much enjoy! Overall I highly recommend this app!

title: By far best editing app
text:
Totally free, great animation options, super easy to learn and use. Compared to all the other apps I‚Äôve used this one by far exceeds them in nearly every category.
The only complaint I‚Äôd have is when I add all my effects, animations, etc the app begins to glitch. Particularly with masking, when i try to playback the edit to check the timing it glitches, slows, freezes, or sometimes even crashes completely. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs just a system overload, but I rarely make anything longer than 1.5 minutes. It can be frustrating not being able to check my work without having to save the video to watch it or shut the app down before it is finished. Other than that, I‚Äôd love more effects/being able to alter the timing of the effects.
But honestly, it is still my go-to and for being 100% free this app is stellar! Love it.

title: It got worseü§ó
text:
I have been using capcut for YEARS AND YEARS and I personally love the app, it‚Äôs amazing for being creative. But all of the ‚Äúpro‚Äù features are really getting on my nerves, I want to make good edits with the app like I used too, but all the pro features are getting in the way! The amount of times that I couldn‚Äôt export a video because the pro is annoying!
Capcut Pro is so expensive! I mean even some one the fonts are pro!!
The real reason I wrote this review was because, I tried to make an edit, and it turned out amazing I Finished it and exported it, I really liked how it looked. Then I came back a couple of days later to see that the main video effect that I was using was made into a pro effect!!
I went back to check the original video with the effect and I couldn‚Äôt export it! 
I love capcut, but this whole pro things is really irritatingüò≠üò≠

title: Can‚Äôt download :(
text: The app is very good, using and editing on it is not hard at all, it‚Äôs just that one time it wasn‚Äôt letting me access any edits I had so I had the genius idea to uninstall the app and then reinstall it so it would work again. Unfortunately I can‚Äôt download it back because it keeps telling me to add a payment method and every time it looks like I fixed the problem and try to download it, it doesn‚Äôt work and it just tells me the same thing. Looking through other reviews I came across someone with the same problem so I‚Äôm glad I‚Äôm not alone on this but I hope they fix this soon or maybe it‚Äôs a me problem and let‚Äôs hope I fix it soon. But for anyone who‚Äôs actually able to download the app I do recommend it.

title: Why it‚Äôs the best app ever.
text:
I use it on every video I have to edit it brings the features you need for videos I didn‚Äôt know until I really try it myself it‚Äôs best for all video edits until now am in love with the app it has every mood you want for example your in a sad mood and you want to edit a video about you being sad Capcut has it all happy, sad, bored everything.
I‚Äôve been using the app for over a year.

Capcut is the best recommended for people who like to edit videos or to make videos it‚Äôs the best.

title: Sending it to friends
text: To start of this I would like to say this app is super easy to use while giving you flawless work if you know how to use it. It is free and simple and easy to understand. Though I have become a good editor a problem is now occurring. The problem is that when I try to download it and share to my friends the work I made isn‚Äôt on beat which is more important down the line of editing. Though I have checked many times if this was my fault It proceeded to fail even though I have  tried a different method of recording and sending it. I know for a fact that it isn‚Äôt me but the software. So if you are sending your edits to friend and have the problem to spread awareness. Thank you so Caput for making me such a good editor though and I hope to see more success in the future.

title: Couldn‚Äôt ask for a better editing app
text: There is no exaggeration when I say that I‚Äôve deleted every other video app on my phone. This app has everything they have and more, all for free. Some apps don‚Äôt even let you test out their other effects and other things without buying their subscription, this app is filled with loads of effects and transitions and so much more all for free and I didn‚Äôt know there could be a mobile app like this, it‚Äôs the After Effects of mobile devices. This review may seem fake or something but I can guarantee you that the reason for this positive feedback is that I make edits on Instagram and have been looking for a way to make my edits when I‚Äôm not home or on my pc. Good work to the creators, Ive shared this with others and will continue to do so!

title: Something‚Äôs up‚Ä¶
text:
Well overall this app is very fun and I love making my own edits. But there‚Äôs something wrong with one of my videos I made recently. (This could just be something wrong with my phone I‚Äôm not sure yet) I added text to the edit and it was perfectly fine. But once I looked at it an hour after I made it, the text was gone except for the first 4 words. The words that didn‚Äôt work were:  ‚Äúand she can‚Äôt get enough‚Äù it all like disappeared and the word ‚Äúenough‚Äù just popped up randomly. I turned off my phone multiple times, I refreshed my screen and nothing worked. (By the way the other videos with text was still working) is this a bug or is my phone just being weird??? 
Please fix this!!!üòÅthanks.

title: My Review
text: I‚Äôve used this app since it came out and it‚Äôs totally the best editing app ever! Well I mean people can have opinions but I know all the things around CapCut and it is so much better with these new effects! You can create your own colorings, make cool shakes, and you can have fun with it! I made a TikTok editing account and CapCut helped me to a lot of followers! One thing I don‚Äôt like about CapCut is that you have to pay for some effects and stuff. I remember it saying, ‚ÄúFree editing app‚Äù I understand that the effects are sometimes hard to produce but its just kind of like other editing apps now. But at least it doesn‚Äôt make you pay for everything like some apps. Other then that, this is the best editing app and you can never change my mind!

title: Amazing
text: This is amazing! I love this editing app and I have been using it for awhile. There is just one problem with it is that it lags most of the time and sometimes crashes me, I have did everything I can but it wouldn‚Äôt work. I don‚Äôt want to delete the app and reinstall it because I will lose all of my progress! But now since there is a sign up button, I will have all my progress saved! But I‚Äôm not completely sure. I don‚Äôt wanna complain, But I would really like some smooth effects in the effect options! There is not really none that I like, The app is amazing but not fully functional yet. I really hope in the future, There will be more improvements! But an app that really isn‚Äôt working well, I am not completely satisfied. Overall, This is an great app! I hope I get a reply.

title: Rad app, but doesn‚Äôt perform intended way anymore
text: I wanna start off saying I love this app. It has many features and editing skills that I love and couldn‚Äôt live without in my day to day life, honestly. However, I can‚Äôt give it a full 5 star rating because recently, for about a month now, none of my effects, the question mark at the top of the screen, or anything else have been working. I‚Äôve looked up solutions but can‚Äôt find anything other than the app being banned in India. I don‚Äôt live in India! This is an issue for me because I can‚Äôt even report the problem to the app due to ‚ÄúNo internet connection‚Äù, which I am connected to. All of my other apps work just fine too. I would love to give five stars, but I don‚Äôt know how to fix this. Any tips or advice would be greatly appreciated, thank you. :)

title: Got me back into editing
text:
I thought I‚Äôd use this for TikTok to create better videos to learn how to utilize it better for a company I‚Äôm involved with and invested in. I started creating memes that were fun and funny that went viral. I started making short films which I haven‚Äôt done in AGES because I always had to use my PC or laptop. 

CapCut makes it easy to design whatever you need. I used it for free but I paid for a month and realized I enjoyed it so much that the yearly subscription was worth it for me. There‚Äôs so much available in the free version that, depending on what you‚Äôre using it for, you don‚Äôt have to buy it. 

There are tutorials and templates in case you get stuck or need help. I still feel as if I haven‚Äôt tapped into half of its potential.

title: Ruined by capitalism
text: CapCut was AMAZING when I first downloaded it, as a beginning editor (who‚Äôs broke) the free tools that available were AMAZING and so helpful, this app was a diamond in the rough, along with the fact it didn‚Äôt leave a watermark. This app was a dream to use and was absolutely fantastic, then they added CapCut pro‚Ä¶.. the charm and the reason I wanted CapCut was because it was amazing and free, I understand they need money to run this, but CapCut pro was a mistake. I hate sounding like a Karen but this just ruined the charm and the factors that made CapCut amazing, it‚Äôs still a good editing app and there are still great free features, however; it‚Äôs no longer amazing. I don‚Äôt blame them for needing funds for the app, and I understand that they put in hard work and need to pay their employees, but CapCut is no longer a gem, it‚Äôs just another victim to capitalism. Still a good app, but it‚Äôs no longer a great app.
